clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Olmesartan Associated With Chlorthalidone Versus Benicar HCT® in Essential Hypertension Control
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety Evaluation of the New Association on Fixed Dose of Olmesartan Medoxomil + Chlorthalidone (40mg + 12.5mg and 40mg + 25mg) Compared With BENICAR HCT® in Hypertension Control

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the non-inferiority clinical efficacy of two different drug associations in the essential hypertension control.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of essential hypertension control based on the reduction of systolic blood pressure at the end of the study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety will be evaluated by the adverse events occurrences
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events will be collected and followed in order to evaluate safety and tolerability

arm_group.description: The patients will take 1 tablet (Olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg + Chlorthalidone 12,5 mg) a day, in the morning.
The patients will take 1 tablet (Olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg + Chlorthalidone 25 mg) a day, in the morning.
The patients will take 1 tablet (Olmesartan 40mg + Hydrochlorothiazide 12,5 mg) a day, in the morning.
The patients will take 1 tablet (Olmesartan 40mg + Hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg) a day, in the morning.
